title: Man suspected of Brown University shooting, MIT professor slaying found dead in N.H. storage facility, authorities say
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Crime A 48-year-old man was behind both the Brown University shooting that killed two and injured nine and the killing of an MIT professor in Brookline, officials said Thursday night.
He took his own life in Salem, N.
H.

title: Gloucester man convicted of beating fellow inmate to death at Bridgewater facility in 2021
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The man was found guilty of manslaughter Wednesday after he was initially indicted on a second-degree murder charge in 2021.
A Gloucester man was convicted of beating another inmate to death while they were incarcerated at Massachusetts Treatment Center in 2021.

Blake Nissen/The Boston Globe A Gloucester man was found guilty of manslaughter Wednesday after he beat another inmate to death while incarcerated at a state prison in 2021, according to court records.

title: Massachusetts Supreme Judicial Court to take up White Stadium case
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News A judge ruled in favor of the city's White Stadium plan earlier this year, but opponents appealed the decision.
A view of the former White Stadium in Franklin Park in early August 2025.

title: The MBTA is testing a new Charlie Card, but it’s missing something — or rather, someone
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Transportation His fate is still unlearned.
A newly-designed Charlie Card will interact with the new card readers.
New fare collection readers are being tested on MBTA buses, place at all doors.

title: Author Stephen King recalls Rob Reiner in heartfelt tribute
author: Lauren Daley
bullets: Celebs "I surprised the hell out of myself by giving him a hug.
" Actor and director Rob Reiner (right) is pictured as he talks to Red Sox season ticket holder and author Stephen King (left) before a game on June 16.

title: 5-year-old student killed in school bus crash in southern Maine
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News The kindergarten student was pronounced dead at the scene on Tuesday.

title: Boston is a must-visit food destination for 2026, according to Condé Nast Traveller
author: Katelyn Umholtz
bullets: Food News The city's dining scene made the list because of its "global flavours, waterfront dining, and more neighbourhood action than ever.
" Somaek, pictured here, was mentioned in a Conde Nast Traveller that put Boston as a must-visit culinary destination for 2026.
